name: _externalAuths
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_record_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, recordRef, provider)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_externalAuths_collection_provider` ON `_externalAuths` (collectionRef, provider, providerId)

name: _authOrigins
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX `idx_authOrigins_unique_pairs` ON `_authOrigins` (collectionRef, recordRef, fingerprint)

emailTemplate.subject: Login from a new location
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

We noticed a login to your {APP_NAME} account from a new location.

If this was you, you may disregard this email.

If this wasn't you, you should immediately change your {APP_NAME} account password to revoke access from all other locations.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: OTP for {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

Your one-time password is: {OTP}

If you didn't ask for the one-time password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your {APP_NAME} email
verificationTemplate.body:
Hello,

Thank you for joining us at {APP_NAME}.

Click on the button below to verify your email address.

Verify

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your {APP_NAME} password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to reset your password.

Reset password

If you didn't ask to reset your password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your {APP_NAME} new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm new email

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

name: employee
collection_lists

updateRule:
@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Admin" ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Department Head" && @request.auth.employee.department ?= employee.department && @request.auth.employee.id != employee.id) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Branch" && @request.auth.employee.branch = employee.branch && @request.auth.employee.id != employee.id) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Employee" && @request.auth.employee.id = employee.id && @request.body.status = "pending")
deleteRule:
@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Admin" ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Department Head" && @request.auth.employee.department ?= employee.department && @request.auth.employee.id != employee.id) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Branch" && @request.auth.employee.branch = employee.branch && @request.auth.employee.id != employee.id) || 

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Employee" && @request.auth.employee.id = employee.id && status = "pending")
name: leave

createRule:
@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Admin" ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Department Head" && @request.auth.employee.department ?= employee.department && (@request.auth.employee != employee || @request.body.status = "pending")) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Branch" && @request.auth.employee.branch = employee.branch && (@request.auth.employee != employee || @request.body.status = "pending")) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Employee" && @request.auth.employee.id = employee.id && @request.body.status = "pending")
updateRule:
@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Admin" ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Department Head" && @request.auth.employee.department ?= employee.department && (@request.auth.employee != employee || status = "pending")) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Branch" && @request.auth.employee.branch = employee.branch && (@request.auth.employee != employee || status = "pending")) ||

(@request.auth.employee.roles.name = "Employee" && @request.auth.employee = employee && @request.body.status = "pending")
name: check_in
